amendment.description: To eliminate tax breaks for those with incomes greater than $1 million and reserve the savings to prevent future cuts in Social Security benefits.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2777 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2777 proposed by Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S2532-2537; text: CR S2532) To eliminate tax breaks for those with incomes greater than $1 million and reserve the savings to prevent future cuts in Social Security benefits.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2777 proposed by Senator Corzine.
